entries.journal_entry_description: Mosolium needs you to gain the security key for the Avatar Space Platform. In order to do this you will need to travel to Etyyy, find Slavemaster Klesk, kill him, and gather up his key card.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Slavemaster Klesk is working in Etyyy currently. You must find him somewhere in that area. Mosolium told you that there are rumors of a Blackscale camp in the southern portion of Etyyy that would be a good place to start looking. The Rodians are extremely protective of this area and will not allow anyone access who has not befriended them yet.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Once you have discovered the whereabouts of Klesk, kill him for his access card.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Report your success in recovering the Avatar Space Platform access pass to Mosolium.
